Literature.Title: Champacyclin, a new cyclic octapeptide from Streptomyces strain C42 isolated from the Baltic Sea.
Literature.Author: Pesic A, Baumann HI, Kleinschmidt K, Ensle P, Wiese J, Süssmuth RD, Imhoff JF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pectobacterium carotovorum(40-50% Inhibition=25µM),Bacillus subtilis(no activity data),Escherichia coli K-12(no activity data),Mammaliicoccus lentus(no activity data),Pseudomonas syringae pv. aptata(no activity data),Pseudomonas fluorescens(no activity data),Xanthomonas campestris(no activity data),Ralstonia solanacearum DSM 9544(no activity data)
